lead.p: isArray â€” Check if the provided parameter is an array.

return.p: boolean. If the parameter is an array, it returns true, otherwise it returns false.

example.heading: isArray example
example.code:
console.log(Array.isArray([])); // true console.log(Array.isArray(new Array())); // true console.log(Array.isArray([1, 2, 3])); // true
console.log(Array.isArray(Array)); // false console.log(Array.isArray('String')); // false console.log(Array.isArray(true)); // false
